resources.string: 2. If the situation does not appear to be dangerous for you, try to calm down the involved parties
3. If there seems to be immediately risk of physical violence, do not hesitate to contact appropriate authorities
4. If you can\'t find immediately assistance by authorities, try to look for any help you can find around
5. Try to call for reason, but don\'t act on your own, if you can get hurt
Dr. Dannie Chalk: Assistance with mentoring, conflict resolution and emotional trauma.
AUBG Office Location: Main Building, Room 255. Meeting with appointment.
Ilko Drenkov: Assistance with on-campus and residence halls problems.
AUBG Office Location: Skaptopara 2, Room 2120. Hours: 3PM-8PM, 9PM-12PM.
Blagoevgrad Police: Dealing with all kinds of criminal issues or activities.
Location: Blagoevgrad Police Department, Vlado Chernozemski St 3, Blagoevgrad. Working 24/7.
Location: Front Desk of Skapto 1, 2, 3, BAC, ABF and Main Building
